channel.title: Problem with Server or Client!
channel.description:
Hey guys!
I got problem with my client or server. When i download an source and a client i can get on the client and server. But when i click 2 times on something, Floor, Item anything 2 times my client just shut down. This happens when i make my own server. I have Windows 7. I didn't had this problem when i had Windows xp everything worked perfect.
Is is a bugg or something wrong with the server & client?, Or is just my computer?
